verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) "Many <WH7227> times <WH7227> they have persecuted <WH6887> me from my youth <WH5271> up," Let Israel <WH3478> now <WH4994> say, <WH559>
"Many <WH7227> times <WH7227> they have persecuted <WH6887> me from my youth <WH5271> up; Yet <WH1571> they have not prevailed <WH3201> against me.
"The plowers <WH9177> plowed <WH9177> upon my back; <WH1354> They lengthened <WH748> their furrows. <WH4618>"
The Lord <WH3068> is righteous; <WH6662> He has cut <WH7112> in two <WH7112> the cords <WH5688> of the wicked. <WH7563>
May all <WH3605> who hate <WH8130> Zion, <WH6726> Be put <WH954> to shame <WH954> and turned <WH5472> backward, <WH268>
Let them be like grass <WH2682> upon the housetops, <WH1406> Which <WH7945> withers <WH3001> before <WH6927> it grows <WH8025> up;
With which <WH7945> the reaper <WH7114> does not fill <WH4390> his hand, <WH3709> Or the binder <WH6014> of sheaves <WH6014> his bosom; <WH2683>
Nor <WH3808> do those who pass <WH5674> by say, <WH559> "The blessing <WH1293> of the Lord <WH3068> be upon you; We bless <WH1288> you in the name <WH8034> of the Lord. <WH3068>"
